name: @bentley/imodeljs-nodeaddon

scripts.test: echo "Error: run tests from the '../test' directory." && exit 1

//dependencies: NOTE: these dependencies are specific to imodeljs-nodeaddon
NOTE: dependencies that are in common with imodeljs-backend must have a consistent version
//optionalDependencies: These dependencies are optional because each one is specific to a single combination of version, platform, and CPU.
If there is an addon for current environment, then npm will select it and filter out the others.
NOTE: List only the addons that a nodejs app/service might need. Do not list Electron-specific addons.
//devDependencies: NOTE: all devDependencies should be recorded in the top-level package.json only
